DominikPieper/obsidian-ReadItLater

Saves web pages to Obsidian as Markdown

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Web-based markdown viewer for Obsidian notes
  • Generates Markdown codebase docs
  • clip web pages to markdown files with a browser extension
  • manage Obsidian notes and vaults in the terminal with a TUI, supports markdown and WYSIWYG editing
  • Converts websites into markdown using OCR and stealth scraping
  • Generates API documentation from Markdown
  • Publishes notes from Obsidian to the web
  • convert files and web content to markdown with a server
  • Neovim plugin for writing and navigating Obsidian vaults
  • Scrapes websites into markdown using remote browsers
